answers.problem: Small businesses struggle to sell online without technical expertise or high costs
answers.target_users: Small business owners with 1-50 employees who want to sell products online
answers.success_metrics: 100 active stores within 6 months, $50k monthly GMV, 4.5+ user rating
answers.scope: MVP focusing on product catalog, payment processing, and basic store management
answers.core_features: Product catalog management, shopping cart, payment processing (Stripe), order management, basic analytics dashboard
answers.nice_to_have: Advanced analytics, multi-language support, inventory management, marketing tools
answers.user_journey: 1. Sign up and create store 2. Add products with photos/descriptions 3. Configure payment settings 4. Share store link 5. Process orders and track sales
answers.technical_requirements: Web-based SaaS, mobile-responsive, 99.9% uptime, PCI compliance, API integrations
answers.constraints: 6-month timeline, $100k budget, team of 4 developers, must integrate with existing payment systems
answers.risks: Payment processor integration complexity, competition from Shopify/Square, user acquisition costs
answers.assumptions: Small businesses will pay $29/month for simple e-commerce, Stripe integration is feasible, mobile-first design is sufficient
answers.dependencies: Stripe API, hosting infrastructure, SSL certificates, domain management system
answers.timeline: Month 1-2: Core platform and product management, Month 3-4: Payment integration and checkout, Month 5-6: Testing and launch
answers.resources: 4 full-stack developers, 1 designer, 1 product manager, AWS hosting, Stripe account
answers.next_steps: 1. Set up development environment 2. Create wireframes and user flows 3. Set up Stripe test account 4. Begin core platform development 5. Plan user testing sessions

answers.problem: Knowledge workers waste 2+ hours daily on task prioritization and context switching
answers.target_users: Professionals, freelancers, and small teams who manage multiple projects simultaneously
answers.success_metrics: 20% reduction in task completion time, 10k+ active users, 80% weekly retention
answers.scope: Personal productivity app with AI-powered task prioritization and smart scheduling
answers.core_features: Task creation and management, AI-powered prioritization, calendar integration, progress tracking
answers.nice_to_have: Team collaboration, time tracking, reporting dashboard, mobile app
answers.user_journey: 1. Add tasks with context 2. AI suggests priorities and schedule 3. Work through optimized task list 4. Review productivity insights
answers.technical_requirements: Cross-platform (web + mobile), real-time sync, AI/ML integration, calendar APIs

answers.problem: Traditional online courses have low completion rates and lack community engagement
answers.target_users: Adult learners seeking professional development and skill advancement
answers.success_metrics: 70% course completion rate, 5k+ active learners, 4.8+ satisfaction score

structure: You are an expert project manager and technical architect.
6. Success metrics and KPIs to track
